title: Painting using One Stroke Technique
headline: Learn to create stunning paintings using this free online course’s easy-to-learn one stroke method.
description: Are you looking for an effective technique for making beautiful paintings? Beginner and experienced painters rely on the one stroke painting technique as an efficient way to add shade, highlights, shadows and colour changes with literally one brushstroke. This course will help you start using this technique and guide you to complete three easy but aesthetically-pleasing painting projects using basic strokes and the required materials.

courseDescription:
While paintings can be hypnotically attractive, undertaking such a painting project might feel overwhelming. By learning the simple one stroke technique, you can create amazing painting projects using simple brushstrokes. This short course will teach you to create artworks that catch the eye using the one-stroke painting technique. It begins by introducing you to the materials needed for using this technique. Next, you will learn to use basic strokes like the teardrop, petal and daisy strokes while we examine the strategy for painting leaves.

Using the basic strokes you have learned so far, you will create beautiful flowers. A simple flower composition will be your first of three projects. On your path to completing this project, you will discover how to select colours. You will explore basic brush care, brush loading and the techniques for painting stems and leaves. You will create more complex paintings of flowers, starting with a composition consisting of pedal strokes, pine leaves and cherries for the following two projects.

On the path to completing your final project, you will learn to paint daisy-like flowers and mix multiple flower types to create a composition. You will also learn to detail the different flower types and add embellishments to make your painting appear ‘fuller’. One stroke painting is a valuable skill to have in the bag for new and experienced artists as it provides a simple yet effective way for creating beautiful paintings. Start now and learn how to add highlights, shade and shadows in under three hours using single brush strokes!
